definitions.definition: Any of the sweet herbs of genus Stevia , native to tropical and subtropical regions of South America and western North America .
A sweetener , many times sweeter than an equal amount of sugar , extracted from Stevia rebaudiana , that can be substituted for sugar for some purposes.

main_definition: Any of the sweet herbs of genus Stevia , native to tropical and subtropical regions of South America and western North America . [from 19th c.]
secondary_definitions: A sweetener , many times sweeter than an equal amount of sugar , extracted from Stevia rebaudiana , that can be substituted for sugar for some purposes.
